madLibs.text: Why did the {noun1} named {name1} {verb1} the {adj1} {noun2}? To {verb2} to the other {adj2} {noun3}!

madLibs.name: Becoming a Pokemon Master
madLibs.description: Your journey to becoming a Pokemon Master
madLibs.text: Welcome {name1}, to the world of Pokemon. You are {number1} years old and you are starting your Pokemon journey with your {adj1} {pokemon1}, nicknamed {name2}. After defeating {number2} Rattatas, you're finally ready to {verb1} Brock's level 12 Onix. After defeating him, you catch a {pokemon2} with your one and only Masterball. With your {adj1} {name2} and your {pokemon2}, you continue your journey to eventually challenge the {adj2} 4!

madLibs.name: Bucketlist
madLibs.description: A bucket list full of poop. Made by Mackenzie.
madLibs.text:
My Bucketlist:
1. {verb1} to {place1}
2. Go {gerund1} at {place2}
3. Get {celebrityM1}'s autograph
4. {verb2} in a {noun1}

madLibs.name: Dream Man
madLibs.text: My dream man should be {adj1} and {adj2}. I want his {bodyPart1} to be like {celebrity1} and his {bodyPart2} to be like {name1}'s. His intelligence should be that of a {animal1} and he should always wash my {bodyPart3}. I hope he takes me to {place1}, where he should whisper {adj3} into my {bodyPart4}. Such a perfect man is hard to find, but I think I've found him in {name2}.
